hadith.text: It was narrated from Abu Bishr Ja'far bin Abi Wahshiyyah that:He heard Humaid bin 'Abdur-Rahman say: "The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: 'The best prayer after the obligatory (fard) prayers is prayer at night and the best fasting after the month of Ramadan is Al-Muharram.'" Shu'bah bin Al-Hajjaj narrated it in Mursal form
